title: The Doom Bots of Doom are coming!

replies.body: Maybe if we're lucky next game mode they'll bring URF vs DOOM, where blue team has URF abilities and purple team has DOOM BOT V abilities. With some tinkering so urf doesn't wreck of course.
Sounds good, but it should be 6v6 and 3 people on each team have to be the same champ. All on Howling Abyss of course. We'll call it "6v6 URF DOOM 1/2 All For One Hexakill."
on Dominion. huehuehuehue
Don't you mean Doom-inion? ;)
Now that you say that... Doom minions sound like a fun idea!
you just blew my mind
The 3 champs that aren't the same also need to be randomized
it would be more outrageous if they did doom bots + urf buff
oh i feel my computer crashing allready
DON'T GIVE RIOT ANY IDEAS
But what if it was AFO HEXAKILL URF DAY?
Does {{champion:31}} turns into a Kaijuu when he has max Feast stacks?
{{champion:44}} Truly outrageous

This is awesome! Riot should do a switcheroo game type where all the modifiers are opposites. Such as Every AP champ now runs off of AD and vice versa? And ryze's abilities now scale with HP instead off mana. It would be a .... *Riot.*
Play {{champion:81}}  and almost nothing changes in that mode lol.

Riot please,will you just keep the game modes you create a part of the game for good. What good is it to have your employees work so hard on this just to take it back out the game. Some people do have lives where they can't get to their computer for just a week. Hopefully riot reads this and thinks about it lol.
not having these special game modes in PvP i get, but at least keep them in customs.
BRING. BACK. URF.
I can't see doom bots being fun at all... just really really frustrating.
People may actually WORK TOGETHER to beat them. It'll be a miracle!
If Garen doesn't jump out of every bush at once, I am going to be disappointed. :(
